comments:
Build ID: 3.3.1 (M20070921-1145)

Steps To Reproduce:
1.open and close the SQL results view
2. use sleak to make a snapshot
3. repeat step 1
4. use sleak to make a diff.

You will see that there was a Font object allocated but not disposed
